channel.title: Error when running server or problem
channel.description: i get this when i try to run my server and i downloaded apache ant and put it in my C:\ 'ant' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Error when running server or problem
item.dc:creator: @Anc13ntsIsBack Anc13ntsIsBack
item.description:
@Anc13ntsIsBack wrote:

[quote=“FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz, post:5, topic:393910”][quote author=Anc13ntsIsBack link=topic=491094.msg3591104#msg3591104 date=1304642201]

set PATH=%PATH%;C:\Users\sql\Desktop\apache-ant-1.8.2\bin set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\ ant runp2p

So replace the Path of C:\Users\sql\Desktop\apache-ant-1.8.2\bin with your path.
Replace the Java_Home Path C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\ with your path.
Replace the ant runp2p with w\e yours is.
[/quote]
ok i did that and it runs but like after 10 seconds of being on the cmd prompt closes.
this is what i was able to copy before it closed
Buildfile: C:\Users\Bracher\Desktop\RSCAngel files\RSCAngel server\build.xml

runp2p:
[java] java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: rsca/gs/Server
[java] Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: rsca.gs.Server
[java] at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202)
[java] at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
[java] at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190)
[java] at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307)
[java] at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301)

 [java]     at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248)
 [java] Could not find the main class: rsca.gs.Server.  Program will exit.
 [java] Exception in thread "main"[/quote]

You’re using RscAngel. You have to fix the runp2p in the build.xml

Do
ant runf2p

Read full topic
item.source: Error when running server or problem

item.title: Error when running server or problem
item.dc:creator: @FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz
item.description:
@FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz wrote:

[quote=“Anc13ntsIsBack, post:4, topic:393910”]set PATH=%PATH%;C:\Users\sql\Desktop\apache-ant-1.8.2\bin set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\ ant runp2p

So replace the Path of C:\Users\sql\Desktop\apache-ant-1.8.2\bin with your path.
Replace the Java_Home Path C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\ with your path.
Replace the ant runp2p with w\e yours is.[/quote]
ok i did that and it runs but like after 10 seconds of being on the cmd prompt closes.
this is what i was able to copy before it closed
Buildfile: C:\Users\Bracher\Desktop\RSCAngel files\RSCAngel server\build.xml

runp2p:
[java] java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: rsca/gs/Server
[java] Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: rsca.gs.Server
[java] at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202)
[java] at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
[java] at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190)
[java] at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307)
[java] at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301)

 [java]     at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248)
 [java] Could not find the main class: rsca.gs.Server.  Program will exit.
 [java] Exception in thread "main"

Read full topic
